abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would provide for:
            (i) construction of water supply system extension in seven
            towns; (ii) technical assistance; and (iii) engineering
            consulting services. It would develop Lesotho's water
            resources; strengthen sector institutions; and upgrade
            domestic water supplies. The project would, by 1986, provide
            public water service to some 20,000 new consumers who now
            rely on unprotected sources and would improve reliability
            and quality of water now supplied to about 21,000 current
            consumers. In addition, the Project would strengthen a key
            Government institution, the Water and Sewerage Branch (WSB)
            of the Ministry of Works (MW).
